Use the rrread Chrome Extension to sync your Kindle highlights.
rrread collects and *resurfaces* your highlights, making it easier to actually remember what you read. ðŸ§ 

Here's how it works:

- Sync your highlights from Kindle to rrread using our Chrome Extension
- Review your highlights easily through a daily email or on rrread.me
- Retain more from your ebooks/articles

Do you have any questions or feedback? Reach out to us at hello@rrread.me.
